vm.config.screen.title: Vein Mining Config
vm.config.search_radius.tooltip:
Range mode search radius
1 means 8 blocks in all directions
plus 9 blocks in each layer, plus center
vm.config.bfs_limit.tooltip:
Set the maximum number of blocks
for chain mode search
vm.config.ignored_blocks.tooltip:
Blocks ignored in chain mode
will use range search instead
Format: namespace:path, e.g. minecraft:air
vm.config.use_bfs.tooltip:
Enable or disable chain search mode
If disabled, range search mode
will be used for all blocks
vm.config.use_radius_search.tooltip:
Enable or disable range search mode
If disabled, range search
will never be used
vm.config.use_radius_search_when_reach_b:
Whether to switch to range mode
when target blocks exceed chain limit
If disabled, chain mining stops at limit
vm.warn.breakthroughs: Your tool is about to break. Vein mining stopped.
vm.config.protect_tools.tooltip:
If enabled, mining stops when
tool is about to break
If disabled, mining continues
vm.config.protected_tools.tooltip:
Tools that will trigger tool protection
Format: namespace:path
e.g. minecraft:diamond_pickaxe
vm.config.protect_allValuable_tools.tool:
Whether to automatically protect
all valuable tools
If enabled, gold, diamond, and
netherite tools will be protected
vm.config.durability_threshold.tooltip:
If durability after mining
will be below this value
tool protection will be triggered
